name: Matcha
description:
Matcha is a simple puzzle game, built around the beautiful Korean writing system, Hangul.

Combine, split and match characters to solve the puzzle, discovering a deeper understanding along the way.

Test your memory, logic and intuition over 400 levels. Devise new techniques to move tiles around the deceptively simple board, and uncover the power and flexibility of the Hangul writing system.

Matcha has no ads, collects no data, doesn't have any micro-transactions or in app purchases, doesn't require an internet connection to play, and is appropriate for children.
